title: Stage Lv10-S07
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: They're similar, but there's a subtle difference.
On the surface they look the same, but they're fundamentally different.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: They're similar, but there's a subtle difference.

sentences.kr: 표면적으론 같아 보이지만, 본질은 완전히 달라.
sentences.en: On the surface they look the same, but they're fundamentally different.

sentences.kr: 일반적인 경우와는 달리, 이건 특별한 상황이야.
sentences.en: Unlike the general case, this is a special situation.
Contrary to expectations, the results were much better.
What sets it apart from other methods is its efficiency.
In contrast to traditional approaches, this is groundbreaking.
What differentiates it from typical cases is the speed.

sentences.kr: 이전 버전과 비교하면, 성능이 현저히 개선됐어.
sentences.en: Compared to the previous version, performance has improved dramatically.
